meanings.definition: In a sloping position or direction.
meanings.sent1: The tree grew aslope on the hill.
meanings.sent2: She walked aslope up the steep path.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to climb the tree aslope, but kept slipping down.
meanings.sent4: The sun set aslope behind the mountains, casting long shadows.
meanings.sent5: The roof of the old house was aslope, giving it a unique charm.

meanings.sent1: The road begins to aslope gently towards the valley.
meanings.sent2: He decided to aslope the garden for better drainage.
meanings.sent3: The children love to aslope down the snowy hill on their sleds.
meanings.sent4: Her voice seemed to aslope upwards in pitch as she got excited.
meanings.sent5: The river seemed to aslope gently towards the horizon, reflecting the colors of the sky.
